description:
Our wide range of commercial coffee tables are available in both contemporary and traditional styles. The low height of coffee tables lends itself well for paring with sofas from our soft seating collection for informal dining. With wooden, metal and glass coffee table tops and bases, there is a great choice of coffee table designs to choose from to suit the decor and interiors of any venue. We offer:
  • Traditional Wooden Tables,
  • Laminate Tables,
  • Glass Tables,
  • Teak, EZ Care & Werzalit Tables.
name: Coffee, Side, Lamp & Occasional Tables
